categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Soot" was the nickname assumed by a clone sergeant who was a clone of the bounty hunter Jango Fett. He served as a clone trooper in the Grand Army of the Republic under the leadership of Captain "Styles" and Commander "Grey."

During his first appearance in Kanan 2, Soot was killed by Jedi Padawan Caleb Dume on the planet Kaller during Order 66. However, Soot was not mentioned in the depiction of Order 66 on Kaller in "Aftermath."
